title: 二叉搜索树中的搜索 (Search in a Binary Search Tree)
content: 思路: // @Title: 二叉搜索树中的搜索 (Search in a Binary Search Tree) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-16 00:59:10 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 44.1 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public TreeNode searchBST(TreeNode root, int val) { if(root==null){ return null; } if(root.val==val){ return root; }else if(root.val>val){ return searchBST(root.left,val); }else{ return searchBST(root.right,val); } } }
